front.title: IEEE Standard for the Electronic Reporting of Transformer Test Data

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Superseded by IEEE Std C57.12.37-2006 A basis for the electronic reporting of transformer test data on liquid immersed distribu-tion transformers as defined in the ANSI C57.12.2X standards series is provided. The specific setof test data to be reported and the format in which it is to be reported is detailed along with an ex-tended set of data as an option for the user.
